data.text: Your voice has value — and now we’re reflecting it and your $cashtag Tweets with the S&P 500 Twitter Sentiment Index, a stock index powered by Twitter data.

Your Tweet may be more than just a Tweet. Your conversation and $cashtags of the top S&P 500 positively talked about companies now are reflected in the S&P 500 Twitter Sentiment Index, powered by Twitter data.

We’re giving you something to talk about: the S&P 500 Twitter Sentiment Index — a stock index powered by Twitter data that measures conversations with $cashtags and positive sentiment to index the most positively talked about S&P 500 companies.

Say 👋  to the S&P 500 Twitter Sentiment Index, an innovative stock index powered by Twitter data. It takes Tweets and $cashtags into account to create an index that truly reflects how the world’s largest focus group feels. #YourVoiceYourIndex

There’s so much information in your Tweets that S&P built a stock index around them. 💪 

The S&P 500 Twitter Sentiment Index measures your Tweets and their $cashtags on the top positively talked about S&P 500 companies. #YourVoiceYourIndex
